mapper.insert: insert into review(reviewTitle, nickName, reviewStar, region, city, postingDate, purchaseSerial, period, text, view, thumbsUp) values(#{reviewTitle}, #{nickName}, #{reviewStar}, #{region}, #{city}, #{postingDate}, #{purchaseSerial}, #{period}, #{text}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select reviewSerial, reviewTitle, nickName, reviewStar, region, city, postingDate, purchaseSerial, period, text, view, thumbsUp from review where purchaseSerial=#{_parameter};
mapper.update: update purchase set myReview=1 where purchaseSerial=#{_parameter};
